answers.answer: Yes! I'm in a similar situtaion. Delivered first due to preeclamplsia at 35wks. Developed preeclamplsia again with this one at 15wks but managing ok so far so desperately hoping to get to 36wks currently 24wks. I had a great 1st csection tho, despite the circumstances, so not nervous to have another. Just want to get this baby as far along as possible. Good luck to you!
Thought I was the only . I just want a healthy csection and a healthy baby. Goodluck to you too
I was starting to think I was the only one too! It's such a rough journey. I will be keeping my fingers crossed for you and bub. When are you due?

I had an emergency c-section with preclampsia at 32 weeks, baby was fine just small. Now i'm 31 weeks and everything is good so far. Doc said I could try vbac but i'm still scared the preclampsia could still come back
Im due feb 4 ill be 19 weeks tommorow .

question: I had my son last year emergency csection at 34weeks  due to preeclampsia . So my doc said im high , risk of getting it again im so nervous for this csection I no I have to have the baby early there only letting me go , to 37 weeks .anyone else had to go . Threw somthing simpler
title: csection??
